slide-1.title: Get to Know Us Better
slide-1.subtitle: We'd love to know that you want to know us better. So, this is who we are and what we do!

who-we-are.title: Who We Are
who-we-are.content-1: Brodewijk is a Fashion-tech company that revolutionize the way people shop by serving customizable, size fit and high-quality wear through technology.
who-we-are.content-2: We disrupt the conventional way of people shopping and solve the concerns of clothing size mismatch, low customer experience, fashion waste, and low-quality product.
